website_summaries.verdict: This handboard is designed to take on the very steep waves and give you the chance to attach your GoPro.
pros: Slot on the front is designed to hold your GoPro camera
Makes it easy to catch waves
Tough outer skin designed to be very durable
cons: Performance might not be what you'd expect in smaller breaks

customer_reviews.title: 5-Stars - The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many styles shapes materials and sizes of bodysurfing handboards over the years. Mostly in SoCal and Hawaii (Oahu). Slyde is by far the best in all aspects - performance feel efficiency strap comfort durability adjustability. Customer service via email AND phone was outstanding when I contacted Slyde about product info, and part replacement when I lost a strap part (not their fault) bodysurfing a large break at Waimea. Slyde website is great with product info, as well tutorials advice on fins and wetsuits, and how-to videos. I’ve been using the Slyde BULA with DaFins (great fins for bodysurfing). Planning to buy Slyde Phish handboard when they are back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: MBC

customer_reviews.title: so much fun
customer_reviews.text: I surf. I surf alot and have been for many years. This thing is alot of fun on walled out days. be prepared to smile because this thing is just fun.
customer_reviews.author: ecarysfort

customer_reviews.title: Slyde
customer_reviews.text: By far the best hand plane I ever used,in San Francisco ,ocean beach
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sobichevsky

customer_reviews.title: Most fun in the ocean without a surfboard.
customer_reviews.text: Too much fun on waves of any size. Just get it
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C.

customer_reviews.title: Be ready for amazing fun...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing hand paddle for waves greater than 3 feet. I also have the larger hand paddle for 1-3 foot waves. They make body surfing so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: iMac808

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting to give it a good use. Tried it once n a really crappy ...
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting to give it a good use. Tried it once n a really crappy day, so I couldn't do a whole lot with it. Feels great on my hand. I look forward to taking it to Puerto Rico to catch some better waves than on the East Coast. I like that this will be easy to travel with with the board bag and fins in a suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bula Heaven!!
customer_reviews.text: The Bula Drip is so sick for those steeper, more knarly waves and days. We have had plenty of those on the West Coast this El Nino winter. The deep concave really sticks you to the face of the wave and prevents sliding out when you are going mach 10 on a grinder. Board is perfect size for swimming with also. I also own the wedge and the hexflex. All the boards are sick and together are one sick quiver for any and all conditions. My kids love the boards too and have almost stolen the others from me. This one is for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Bought 6 Handboards from Steve & Angela Founders of Slyde. Their products are top quality!
customer_reviews.text: Steve & Angela Watts are honest, hard working, family oriented people. The kinda people you would like to do business with and purchase from. I bought these for Christmas Presents for my Kids and Grand Kids they all love em. Pros: Da boards float like one rubbah slippah Brah.
customer_reviews.author: liftdog

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The Bula board is perfect for the crumbly beach break I go to - the shape handles super well and gives me more time on the wave. Seriously so much fun every single time, whether little 2-3' days or big south swells. I'm a Slyde supporter for life!
customer_reviews.author: illicit

customer_reviews.title: quite possibly the greatest body surfing accessory ever made
customer_reviews.text: After fins, quite possibly the greatest body surfing accessory ever made! I've used many hand guns, hand planes, wave blades, etc, etc...the Slyde Bula is the best! Add the GoPro attachment for the coolest videos and it's a MUST have for all body wompers!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Budman

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Better!!!
customer_reviews.text: This handboard is INCREDIBLE! LOVE IT!!!! Went out this morning and got some epic footage using the GoPro attachment! Makes body surfing even more fun! Can't wait for more upcoming sessions!
customer_reviews.author: David Budman

customer_reviews.title: bought a grip for my Slyde board works great.
customer_reviews.text: bought a grip for my Slyde board works great. Got the board last year, decided I needed to try the grip this year. Big help, big difference. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: Aloha
customer_reviews.text: Needed a reason to get back into the water after not going for years. Got the bula board with go pro attachment,leash and bag. Well worth the price. Got back into the water and love the response and handle of the board. I also got a board for my 12 year old son and now we both go and love the time we spend together as well as the water and board. For sure we will be getting other boards as well.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Bula! Bula!
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, slick and sick! Beautiful craftsmanship & design. The Bula Drip Handboard with the Go Pro Attachment by Slyde was the perfect present!
customer_reviews.author: Marina Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Having a family vacation on the Big ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Having a family vacation on the Big Island and only purchased one handboard - big mistake should have bought four! Once you use it, you feel naked without it. Everyone wanted their turn. Keep up the innovation! Loved getting pitted in the Barrel with this thing! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Keenan Leon Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: but the bula carbon is the best, especial for shorebreak
customer_reviews.text: Hi this is mi 3 Slyde handboard, y try for years hydro, hang ten etc, but the bula carbon is the best, especial for shorebreak, I use in different beaches now I going to lima Peru Southamerica have very good and power wave high recommend thank Slyde family.
customer_reviews.author: DIAZ11373

customer_reviews.title: Flawless design for both board and hand strap! These ...
customer_reviews.text: Flawless design for both board and hand strap! These guys don't mess around! These boards are worth every penny! Who wouldn't want to grab a handboard, throw it in your car and hit the waves?!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely insane hand plane. I've used most hand planes ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely insane hand plane. I've used most hand planes on the market from austrailia to california and from japan to hawaii. The bula will have you BODYSURFING FOR THE REST OF YOUR LIFE.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sergio Cantolla
customer_reviews.text: Many many thanks for your attetion in whole process to send me my handboard. I am glad with it. Best regards for all.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Cantolla

customer_reviews.title: Easy to turn
customer_reviews.text: The board does every thing they say it can. Sticks to the face of the wave. Make steep drops. Easy to turn. Stoked. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Slyde Handboards SLYDE Hawaiian Bula Shorebreak Specialty Body Surfing Hand Board/Handplane with Camera Attachment, Lightweight and Travel Friendly
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :11 x 7.5 x 3 inches; 1.55 Pounds
 * Department :Unisex-adult
 * Date First Available :December 12, 2015
 * Manufacturer :Slyde Handboards
 * ASIN :B01999U3FE


 * Customer Reviews:4.3 out of 5 stars39 ratings
feature_bullets: 🌊 HAWAIIAN DESIGNED AND APPROVED BODY SURFING HAND PLANE / HANDBOARD - Built on the Slyde Hawaiian Bula Shape Approved by the world’s greatest bodysurfers and handboarders for its extra deep concave that will give you the grip you need to stay on any steep wave. PERFECTLY DESIGNED - The sharp, crisp rails of the Bula handboard cut effortlessly through a punchy shorebreak and handles perfectly down a vertical takeoff.

👍LIFETIME GUARANTEE We stand behind our boards to last a lifetime and we guarantee against defects in materials and workmanship - HIGHLY DURABLE High-density Polyurethane foam core for a perfect combination of lightness, strength and bouyancy. A flak jacket high pressure laminate outer layer technology for insane added strength, and never fade screen printed graphics. These boards will last year after year

SHORE BREAK SPECIALTY HANDBOARD - Designed and tested by legendary Point Panic’s local and Kaha Nalu Hawaii founder, Sean Enoka. Years of development for the perfect shore break body surfing handboard.

💓 FAMILY OWNED AND RUN. THE BEST QUALITY HANDBOARD IN THE INDUSTRY SINCE 2010 - Based in San Clemente, California. Slyde Handboards manufacturing process is the most advanced in the handboard industry using only the best materials that will last you a lifetime of fun!

ADJUSTABLE STRAP AND GO PRO READY - Strap fits any size hand, Each Bula handboard strap is padded for extra comfort and held in place with big wave surfing tow in plugs and stainless steel screws. Extra safe GoPro mount insert comes standard, for endless selfies. The bula handboard is for the elite bodysurfer / handboarder looking to take their handboarding to the next level.
